    if x > 10:
        return x * y

2) method λ‚΄λ¶€μ—μ„ λ‹¤λ¥Έ λ©”μλ“ νΈμ¶ν•κΈ°

λ‹¤λ¥Έ λ©”μλ“λ¥Ό νΈμ¶ν•λ ¤λ©΄ self. μ„ μ‚¬μ©ν•΄μ•Ό ν•λ‹¤.

def say():
    return "I am external other function."


class FishShapedBun:
    def say(self):
        return "Delicious~"

    def how_much(self):
        return 1000

    def greeting(self):
        print(self.say())
        print(say())
        return 'Hi~~~ '
a = FishShapedBun()
a.greeting()
Delicious~
I am external other function.
'Hi~~~ '
